targets.query:
from(bucket: "factory-data1")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "machine")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "vibration")

from(bucket: "factory-data1")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "machine")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "temperature")

from(bucket: "factory-data1")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "machine")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "motor_load")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "factory-data1")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "machine")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "failure_soon")
  |> last()
